markdown:
| icon           = poe2 glove_05 icon.png
| description    = Woedica's most feared avatar, the Strangler, manifests in the world to punish oathbreakers. If tales be true, once the Strangler has marked a victim for death, no force or barrier can keep her from her justice. Traitors, usurpers, perjurers, and all manner of those who turn their backs on solemn vows fear the clutching strength of the goddess. These gloves, while unlikely those of the Strangler herself, contain a dreadful, vengeful charm. The leather along the knuckles is stretched from frequent clenching and the palms are polished smooth.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Hands
| item_type      = Gloves
